references: N. J. A. Sloane, A Handbook of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1973 (includes this sequence).
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..300
prog: (PARI) {for(ixp=0, 34,casi = 2^ixp; cvst=0;while(casi != 0,cvd = casi%9; cvst=10*cvst + cvd + 1; casi = (casi - cvd) / 9 );while(cvst !=0,ptch = cvst%10; print1(ptch-1); cvst = (cvst - ptch) / 10 );print1(", "))} /* _Douglas Latimer_, Apr 23 2012 */
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
